text: The Outsiders is a 1983 crime and drama movie. It is set in 1965, Tulsa, Oklahoma. It is about tough low-income working class teenagers. Sherri Valance is played by Diane Lane. Matt Dillon plays Dallas Winston. Emilio Estevez plays Keith Matthews. Patrick Swayze plays Darrel Curtis. Tom Cruise plays Steve Randle. Rob Lowe plays Soda Curtis. The movie is based on the 1967 novel of the same name. It was released on March 25, 1983. Its rating was changed to PG-13. The reviews of the movie were mostly positive. == Other websites == * Category:1983 crime drama movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American gangster movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Oklahoma Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies directed by Francis Ford Coppola Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about brothers
title: The Outsiders (movie)
